publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1603.1 Jamie McGrigor: Housingâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1603) in the name of Johann Lamont, insert at end "further believes that the right to buy should not be further restricted, and calls on the Scottish Government to encourage councils to bring forward plans for housing stock transfer to take advantage of the debt write-off which is available from HM Treasury and promote new investment as a result."
